text: Sarah Margaret Roffey Jewell (born February 21, 1956) is a British-born American businesswoman. She is the 51st United States Secretary of the Interior. She served in the government of President Barack Obama from April 2013 to 2017. She is the second woman to hold the position, after Gale Norton. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:United States Secretaries of the Interior Category:Businesspeople from Washington (state) Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Sally Jewell
